definition: Premier Zhou Enlai 周恩來|周恩来 (1898-1976)
surname Zhou/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
week/weekly/variant of 周[zhou1]
always/to assemble/gather/total/overall/head/chief/general/in every case
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Premier Zhou's illustrious deeds are an everlasting monument in the hearts of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 周总理的光辉业绩在中国人民心中立下了不朽的丰碑。

sentences.english: Premier Zhou we are concerned about how to answer.
sentences.chinese: 大家都关注周总理怎样回答。

sentences.english: Everyone wants to visit the place where premier Zhou once worked.
sentences.chinese: 大家都想参观周总理曾工作过的地方。

sentences.english: Premier Zhou has an extremely penetrating mind.
Premier Zhou employ to stay ITe.
sentences.chinese: 周总理曾经常在那里办公。

sentences.english: This is the room where Premier Zhou once worked.
sentences.chinese: 这就是周总理曾经工作过的房间。

sentences.english: The shining image of Premier Zhou Enlai is indelibly engraved on the memory of the people.
sentences.chinese: 周总理的光辉形象永远铭刻在人民的心中。

sentences.english: Premier Zhou was one of the great cest statesmen in the world.
sentences.chinese: 周总理是世界上最伟大的政治家之一。

sentences.english: People deeply mourned over Premier Zhou's death.
sentences.chinese: 人们痛悼周总理的逝世。

sentences.english: Who that met Premier Zhou was not impressed by his manners?
sentences.chinese: 见到周总理的人谁不被他的举止所感动？

sentences.english: Premier Zhou held a press conference on China's achievements in construction.
sentences.chinese: 周总理举行记者招待会，介绍我国建设成就。

sentences.english: Copy of Tiananmen Poems is a poetry anthology people compiled to commemorate our prime minister Zhou Enlai.
sentences.chinese: 《天安门诗抄》是人民自发怀念周总理而作的诗歌集。

sentences.english: I had a chance to see Premier Zhou just because I attended that meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我之所以见到周总理就是因为我参加了那次会。

sentences.english: On these occasions he was given a dinner in his honor and Premier Chou En-lai would attend.
sentences.chinese: 这时候，主人总要为他举行宴会，周总理也出席。

sentences.english: Also, and would like to Premier Zhou rivalry, the doors are not.
sentences.chinese: 也是，想和周总理较劲，门都没有。

sentences.english: Zhou is always kept in our mind.
sentences.chinese: 周总理永远被我们记在心里。

definition: Zhou Enlai (1898-1976), Chinese communist leader, prime minister 1949-1976
Chairman Mao/Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 (1893-1976), Chinese Communist leader
Deng Xiaoping (1904-1997), Chinese communist leader, de facto leader of PRC 1978-1990 and creator of "socialism with Chinese characteristics"
Liu Shaoqi (1898-1969), Chinese communist leader, a martyr of the Cultural Revolution
Mao Zedong (1893-1976), Chinese communist leader
Hua Guofeng (1921-2008), leader of Chinese Communist Party after the Cultural Revolution
Deng Yingchao (1904-1992), Chinese communist leader, wife of Zhou Enlai 周恩來|周恩来
Hu Yaobang (1915-1989), Chinese politician

Peng Dehuai (1898-1974), top communist general, subsequently politician and politburo member, disgraced after attacking Mao's failed policies in 1959, and died after extensive persecution during the Cultural Revolution
Zhu De (1886-1976), communist leader and founder of the People's Liberation Army
Li Xiannian (1909-1992), PRC general and politician
Li Fuchun (1900-1975), communist politician
Dong Biwu (1886-1975), one of the founders of the Chinese communist party
Yang Shangkun (1907-1998), former president of PRC and military leader
Chen Yi (1901-1972), communist general and politician, Marshal of PLA from 1955, Mayor of Shanghai in 1950s, PRC foreign minister 1958-1972
Lin Biao (1908-1971), Chinese army leader at time of the Cultural Revolution
